Are you sick and Tired of people that are unable to setup the addon properly and spamming the chat with <EH> and having chat bubbles pop up midfight that blind you and let you stand in even more shit? use this wa that helps out against the people unsing elitesim helper by spamming them with whispers like they spam you 

additional tips:

Using Backgroundless Chat bubbles like https://www.tukui.org/forum/viewtopic.php?t=30 
there is an interface option to disable chat bubbles from group messages sent (interface -> game -> display)
You could also just ignore the guy when the key starts no chat bubbles if he's on ignore

DISCLAIMER
I would encourage the use of Elitism Helper if it was just listing the Dmg taken AFTER the dungeon instead of spamming stupid speech bubbles mid fight that clutter your screen with unecessary info.

Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].
If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
